alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Morgan, southeastern Henry, central Walton, eastern Butts, northwestern Jasper and Newton Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Jersey to near Oak Hill, and moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Covington, Jackson, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Rutledge, Newborn, Flovilla, Mansfield, Bostwick, Good Hope, Jersey, Stewart, Turtle Cove, Ola, Worthville, Pannell, Eudora and North Alcovy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Henry; Jasper; Morgan; Newton; Walton
